message: Added a new tab at the top of this channel. Here's a link.
Hi all - I posted the documents from Mursion in a folder called 05. Mursion.
Hello! Welcome to our project Team. I'll be putting some structure around it over the next few days.
And Joy mentioned this TedTalk How to Outsmart Your Own Unconscious Bias | Valerie Alexander | TEDxPasadena - YouTube (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GP-cqFLS8Q4)

Adding note here that came in from Monica about Netflix doc "This Changes Everything" - " I watched the above documentary on Netflix. All about the Geena Davis Institute and the history of gender bias and parity efforts ( mostly failures) in Hollywood. So good! I learned alot, and it could present some good clips for any future custom training you might build for NBCU."
Most recent update from Joy. Thought I'd share it here too :).

Nicole Barile and Vince Bongiovanni Today, I've worked on the NBCU report; taking into consideration all of the input we've received to date with a focus on the evolving story of the recommendations. On one hand the edits (to content) remain relatively the same; however, on the others the changes are significant, but mostly structural. I'm proposing some significant re organization. This is because while our recommendations remain basically the same, I wanted to create a more clear and singular narrative. This process also helped me identify the redundancies that have been mentioned and hopefully eliminate them while making the relationship between recommendations more evident.
Hey all! I put the new NBCU deck in Files, under Recommendations. It's titled "UFEG Revisions....."

Maxel Schingen Vince Bongiovanni Tamara Thorpe I just uploaded the PPT under the Recommendations folder. Max & Vince - you can look at slides 16-27 to see where you can enter your quotes. Ignore the rest of the deck - it's a mess! . Thanks all!!

6/9 Meeting: To discuss themes and get into discussing recommendations. Also chat about upcoming 6/10 meeting to debrief interviews. - For Thurs call we need to provide examples, ask questions, and show detailed themes. They also want to get an idea what the recommendations will look like/be like - Per our 6/8 meeting with NBCU, Vince will be working on a grid-like chart that shows who gets what in terms of recommendations & reporting out (project team, Abhijay & Dwight, studio heads, focus group participants, survey participants) - to be sent to NBCU prior to Thurs call - We need to submit some questions ahead of time prior to Thurs call - Is Abhijay above studio heads? - Tell us more about how decisions are made - Who initiates change typically? What is the process for change within the org? - Tell us more about matching grants - Donna Langley interview now 6/23 - must incorporate into analysis - Notes: - What else do we need to know that we don't know yet? More about their decision-making processes? How are decisions made? - What else are they doing in terms of DEI initiatives? Can we tie that into our recs? Joy & Mel getting some info to us - How can we include studio heads throughout - can we talk about this on Thurs? They want studio heads to feel they are included early - Date for presenting analysis & recs maybe June 29 during our weekly call - just for project team - Joy & Mel will share sample of data so we can see how they present to studio heads; however, they said to use our LCW format/style _____________________________________________________________________________

New SOW, UTBE - not customized: " switch out the Netflix video for an alternate video on representation. We can also make any other adjustment that you all think will make it the best fit for you all."

Laverne Cox to Be Re-Dubbed By Woman for Promising Young Woman in Italy - Variety (https://variety.com/2021/film/news/laverne-cox-promising-young-woman-dubbing-universal-pictures-international-1234971854/?cx_testId=49&cx_testVariant=cx_1&cx_artPos=5#cxrecs_s)

From Joy: "Separately, I caught up with our DWA counterpart today and she shared great examples from Bad Guys (theatrical) and another from Gabby’s Dollhouse (TV, but still relevant). She also shared an example of something that came up in a training, reinforcing the importance of empowerment to speak up – at all levels. Remind me to brief you at some point."
A weekly internal meeting to discuss NBCU work
NBCU wants to sort data by studio. In order to do this in Survey Monkey, we will need separate links for each studio - Universal, Focus, DreamWorks. Not sure about GTDI??
PVOD = Premium Videos On Demand

Things Monica & Chuck should know about 1:1 interviews: Margie - be pragmatics, direct, business-driven, Monica should drive and make Margie feel comfortable, Margie more comfortable talking in small groups settings, she cares and gets it but competency isn't there, recent departures of Black employees from DW. Kujo - more laid-back and conversational, don't be super corporate, be direct. Peter - concerned about making mistakes and what his boss (Donna L) thinks of him, he will need to be clear on how the info is being used, nervous calling people out on their behavior, make it intimate , wants to look favorable, must be genuine, make him feel psychologically safe

For 1:1 interviews - initial thoughts from Joy: - Margie Cohn: Monica + Maybe Tamara? - Peter Cramer: Monica + Randy/Chuck or Larry, not sure yet. I would lobby for Randy and Monica (want female perspective for sure), but the team feels like we need a BIPOC presence to the feedback can be fully internalized. - Pete Kujawski: Not sure. Want to get some more context from Michelle. Lean toward Monica + Chuck

Flagging this here to bring up in this weeks meeting: Could we speak to leadership about the ACs attending an in-person session to shadow facilitators? Also what is the process for using our professional development funds?
So, what are we to do if norton expires? Anyone else dealing with antivirus expiration?

Vince Bongiovanni Ada Vargas Conner Williams Amir Ghazaleh Hey Y'all I see we have a bi-weekly meeting scheduled for today, were you all able to attend or did you plan to have time back? I would benefit from us connecting and sharing how we are all doing and sharing one tip we learned over the week. I would also benefit from having time back. Let me know what you all prefer!

Hi Everyone - During today's call, Dustin suggested that we all familiarize ourselves with existing Microlearning's created in Rise. You can find links to many of these in the LCW Capabilities Deck. In addition, he provided three other sources for our review: https://rise.articulate.com/share/JkuRK9tV0T-0jVhC2cnTB30bTUUEpj74#/ (https://rise.articulate.com/share/JkuRK9tV0T-0jVhC2cnTB30bTUUEpj74#/) https://rise.articulate.com/share/YGo33O2LHVOE6y99vM4DwzDgWQDi8Zn-#/ (https://rise.articulate.com/share/YGo33O2LHVOE6y99vM4DwzDgWQDi8Zn-#/) https://rise.articulate.com/share/TRYqHbPbRkQQjwkgHfqLNdvDk_l2pq5M#/ (https://rise.articulate.com/share/TRYqHbPbRkQQjwkgHfqLNdvDk_l2pq5M#/)

Hey ACs, I hope y’all are doing well today. I am reaching out to request your assistance serving as note takers for a series of Quad interviews. This will be very similar to the focus groups hold, the only difference is these will be 1:1 interviews w/ Quad leadership members. Take a look at the below schedule and let me know or mark in red if you are not free to assist with note taking for the day/time I have you slated. I am extending gratitude from me and Zoe Allerding THANK YOU all for your help. Interviewee Name Date/Time CST Interviewer Assistant Jennifer (Jennie) Kent Maura Packham 9/22 11-12 pm Rebecca Vince Bongiovanni Dylan Blohm 9/24 9-10 am Monica Ada Vargas Artell Smith Hernan Gioiosa Tom Frankowski 9/30 11-12 pm Chuck Emani Dave Honan 9/29 1-2 pm Monica Ada Chris Hiland 9/29 10-11 am Chuck Amir Ghazaleh Kevin Bridgewater 9/30 10-11 am Chuck Amir Ghazaleh Duffy Lampen & Ryan DeLoge 9/23 2-3 pm Rebecca Vince Sasha Dantzler 9/24 11-12 pm Rebecca Emani

Hey Team, I was just thinking about managing my schedule and how to keep track of the different workstreams I have going on. I know that in a few weeks Amir Ghazaleh and I will be getting busier with NorthWestern deliverables. As a consultant, how do you strategically block out future time so that your schedule remains flexible for requests as they come up. But also structured enough for you to use work time efficiently in anticipation of projects coming down the pipeline, other than just leveraging focus time. *** This doesn't need an immediate answer, just thought it might be helpful to talk through during a meeting. Tamara Thorpe Ada Vargas Vince Bongiovanni Conner Williams

Hey Dream Team! Ada Vargas Conner Williams Amir Ghazaleh Vince Bongiovanni I have had a number of consultants state that they cannot attend the presentation and requested us to record. Before your scheduled prep session or during the prep session get permission to record the presentation so that we have our bases covered.

I shared a few resources with Ada today that you all might also be interested in: https://www.vitalsource.com/products/the-sage-handbook-of-intercultural-competence-darla-k-deardorff-v9781483342894?duration=120&utm_source=bing&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=VST%20Tier%20One%20ShoppingGoogle-US&msclkid=ee4bf1cc218a121a67fa912086d580f1 (https://www.vitalsource.com/products/the-sage-handbook-of-intercultural-competence-darla-k-deardorff-v9781483342894?duration=120&utm_source=bing&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=VST%20Tier%20One%20ShoppingGoogle-US&msclkid=ee4bf1cc218a121a67fa912086d580f1)

www.thiagi.com (https://www.thiagi.com)
Hey! RP is looking for some support with making some updates with our Classroom sales decks. So it'll be some work with our content, PowerPoint and Dropbox. Let me know if you’ve got availability.
Vince Bongiovanni Ada Vargas Emani Richmond Conner Williams Do any of you have bandwidth today to help Dan with an Excel project?

Melissa Neu Ada Vargas Amir Ghazaleh Vince Bongiovanni Conner Williams Happy Thursday I hope and trust everyone is prepared to finish this week out productively. FYI: Based on Monica's calendar it seems like she is in PTO from July 1st- July 6th and July 28th- August 15th, so try to plan around those dates so she can attend if possible.

Ada Vargas Emani Richmond Conner Williams Amir Ghazaleh Vince Bongiovanni Hello all! I'm looking forward to our team meeting this Friday. On the agenda will be: Check-in, Project updates (30, 60, 90), Holiday Calendar, Consultant touch points-Workload, Feedback, wins, needs, and TOIT in July
This was the response I received: Amir, thanks for reaching out. Instead of presenting, could we have someone interview me and do a keynote conversation? Thanks, Mita

Ada Vargas Amir Ghazaleh Vince Bongiovanni Conner Williams Melissa Neu Hey Y'all, Just as a reminder please send out initial contact to your board member by EOD today. I know Vince was having trouble with his board member's email address. And Melissa has already made contact with Bernard's assistant so that's great progress. If you need help with anything or troubleshooting any roadblocks let me know. In the words of Conner Williams I'm here for you

Once all folks have responded I will go through and make final edits.
Is anyone else having so many issues with their computers today after IT changes last night? I've spent way too much time today trying to reinstall things like chrome and evernote to little avail.
Amir Ghazaleh and anyone else who may have paid; I'll refund your payment.

Hey team I just posted the notes from the meeting in the Wiki section under the team charter. If you have time add in anything I may have missed that you wanted to highlight.

Amir Ghazaleh Conner Williams Ada Vargas Vince Bongiovanni Melissa Neu Hey team can someone explain what a draft note is within the context that Monica used yesterday? I was just writing an action item list for what needs to happen next with the board member project and I wrote "write draft note... then though I don't know what this is"

It was great to see you all today for our first official team meeting. I'm looking forward to our 1:1's over the next week. I put together the needs and wants you all shared today to create a Team Charter in Wiki (https://teams.microsoft.com/l/entity/com.microsoft.teamspace.tab.wiki/tab::0f62281a-bd4a-4e8f-b877-da5d59374281?context=%7B%22subEntityId%22%3A%22%7B%5C%22pageId%5C%22%3A2%2C%5C%22sectionId%5C%22%3A3%2C%5C%22origin%5C%22%3A2%7D%22%2C%22channelId%22%3A%2219%3A21b2ee7919a54c87941fe3b94baf545b%40thread.tacv2%22%7D&tenantId=3ca40a42-d72d-43c9-b92e-0740101d9dd3) . Hello, all!
